item.title: Ali Akbar, who's sold newspapers on the streets of Paris for 50 years, is now a knight
item.description: For decades, Ali Akbar has sold papers on the Left Bank of Paris. Last month, France gave the beloved 73-year-old immigrant from Pakistan one of its highest honors — and his neighborhood is cheering.
